attributes.action: Keep Uber from operating in UK. It has taken livelihoods from taxis & minicabs.
attributes.background: Uber has bankrupted hundreds of Minicab companies with thousands of drivers and put out of work thousands of black cab drivers. There are fewer and fewer iconic black cabs in London due to Uber. They take advantage of their drivers who may be working part time. They paid only £411k tax.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. It is the responsibility of Transport for London.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
